name: v4composites_calibrated
title: Nighttime Lights
description: Version 4 DMSP-OLS Nighttime Lights. The lights from cities, towns, and other sites with persistent lighting, including gas flares. Ephemeral events, such as fires have been discarded. Calibrated across sensors and years using Elivdge 2014 coeficients.

extras.citation: Image and Data processing by NOAA's National Geophysical Data Center. DMSP data collected by the US Air Force Weather Agency.
